title: Ben Affleck Shares Powerful Note About Alcoholism and Recovery
text:
Your Privacy Rights Canadian Customers 
Ben Affleck is, by any measure, one of the most successful Hollywood stars working today. Though he has had his fair share of career flops ( Gigli , Live By Night ), the Oscar-winning director and leading man has enjoyed the type of acclaim reserved for just a lucky few. 
But Affleck is also a human being, and a recent Facebook post he shared in which he detailed his recent struggles with alcoholism served as a stirring reminder that Affleck can be as vulnerable as any of us. While receiving treatment for his addiction, he had the opportunity to reflect on his personal journey and the things that matter most to him in his life. In the post, Affleck shared those reflections with his followers, while also thanking his family and friends for their love and support. The most stirring moment comes when Affleck reminds us that seeking help is something we should never be ashamed of. Advertisement
